app_id.title: App ID
app_id.description: The ID of the app to create the item in (can be passed dynamically from previous steps)

fields.title: Fields
fields.description: Object with field external_ids or field_ids as keys and field values. Structure must match the target app's schema.

external_id.title: External ID
external_id.description: Optional external identifier for the item

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Array of tags to apply to the item

hook.title: Execute Hooks
hook.description: Whether to execute hooks for this item creation (default: true)

silent.title: Silent Mode
silent.description: If true, suppresses notifications and activity stream updates (default: false)
